column2: Retail Value, Inc. operates as a real estate investment trust, which engages in owning and operating of retail shopping centers. The company is headquartered in Beachwood, Ohio. The company owns, operates and finances shopping centers. The firm intends to realize value for shareholders through the operations and sales of the Company’s assets. As of May 23, 2019, the Company’s portfolio consisted of 21 continental United States assets 12 Puerto Rico assets and totaled 16 million square feet of gross leasable area (GLA).
